name: Microwave Meatballs & Noodles with Salad and Garlic Baguette
description: Family-friendly meatballs with noodles, a crisp salad, and warm garlic baguette. All heat-and-eat components for a no-chili, under-15-minute dinner.
prep_steps: Clear counter space and set out 4 plates and serving tongs.
Open the salad and have the salad dressing ready.
If using the oven for the garlic baguette, preheat to the pack’s recommended temperature; otherwise plan to microwave it.
cook_steps: Microwave meatballs with noodles according to pack directions (heat one tray at a time if using two; stir halfway if instructed).
Heat the garlic baguette: microwave per pack directions for the fastest option, or bake in the preheated oven if preferred.
Toss the salad with salad dressing in the bag or a bowl.
Plate the meatballs with noodles, add a handful of salad to each plate, and serve with slices of garlic baguette.
